fi.uef.caao
Class CaaoServerCore

java.lang.Object
  fi.uef.caao.CaaoServerCore

public class CaaoServerCore
extends java.lang.Object

The class implements basic methods for the client application. Used as handler class for the xml-rpc service. See the comments on each method for details. Design notes: -- the thread safety was taken into consideration -- wrapper classes of the jdk was taken into account, so with small modification you can use different databases. This implementation uses mySQL

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
zafar.khaydarov
